Alaska Airlines

Partner Authentication Example - SAML Login Example


Clicking this button will do the following:

  1. Redirect you to AlaskaAir.com's Okta implementation to login.
  2. After successful login, Okta POSTs to the Saml/Consume endpoint.
  3. The Saml/Consume endpoint decodes and returns the Saml XML.
  4. The Saml should contain the relay_state value.

View the Saml consumer endpoint Swagger documentation here.
